page.title: 14Tourism in Itchenor area
page.content: Itchenor is a much favoured centre for sailing, having a hard that is usable at all states of the tide. There is a popular waterbus providing trips for birdwatchers, natural history enthusiasts, and visitors.A ferry running from Itchenor to Bosham is available daily during the summer season. Non-routine trips may be booked through the Conservancy Office. At W.Wittering there is a static caravan park with 180 mobile homes which can be occupied from March to October. There is also a motorvan and tent park of 10 acres which has 60 static caravans for letting during the summer. The Ship Inn, the only inn in the area, provides bar snacks, has a rest- aurant, and offers overnight accommodation.A number of houses in the area also let to summer visitors.
